title: SP12 "One Piece: Episode of East Blue: Luffy and His Four Friends' Great Adventure"[4]Transliteration: "Wan Píszu: Episōdo obu Īsuto Burū: Rufi to Yo-nin no Nakama no Dai-bōken" (Japanese:ワンピース エピソードオブ東の海（イーストブルー）～ルフィと4人の仲間の大冒険～) Takashi Otsuka Tomohiro Nakayama August 26, 2017(2017-08-26) 106 minutes
